formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Sliding Resistance \( R = c \cdot A + N \cdot \tan(\phi) \) Where \( c \) is the cohesion, \( A \) is the area, \( N \) is the normal force, and \( \phi \) is the friction angle.

variables.meaning: property tax (annual or monthly depending on input)
